attributes.action: Stop the government from getting rid of the Post-Graduate Work Visa
attributes.additional_details: It is so unfair that they pay so much money to keep our institutions running and then they might be unable to stay here due to government restrictions.
attributes.background: We want the government to stop discussing the abolition of the post-graduate work visa. There are so many restrictions on international students already and they pay so much to study here.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar  action: Commit to keeping the Graduate Visa Route https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654811
